name: Father Foreplay
description:

This game contains acts of violence and sexual ideas towards people of religious faith. By proceeding with this game, you alone are held accountable with how you react to the content within this game. We encourage you to walk up to any of the team members and bring up any material from our game that you deem as going too far. You will be asked to explain why you think we went too far.

Synopsis

In Foreplay, you play as a reverend who is shocked to find that the st Pa cathedral has suffered allegations of child molestation's as of late.  Wanting to know the cathedrals side of the story, the reverend arrives only to find the whole place appears to be closed. As the reverend walks closer to the front door, a little boy in uncomfortably short shorts opens the door and gestures the reverend inside. But when the reverend enters the church however, the boy locks the door shut and lunges at the reverend, clawing at as if he's trying to tear his skin off. The reverend tries to struggle the boy off of him, eventually grabbing a nearby incense burner and bashing the boy with it against the wall and forcing him to run off. The reverend took  a moment to rest himself, trying figure out why a little boy would just attack him out of nowhere. With nowhere else to go but deeper into the cathedral, the reverend tightens his grip on the the incense burner and carry's on to find more answers to his growing list of questions.

  • Bash your way through young sinners of the cathedral
  • Climb through the unholy spire
  • "Cleanse" the tainted with your incense (Cleanse = hit)
